explains: v. 黏附，附着；遵守，遵循（规定或协议）；拥护，持有（观点或信仰）

sentences.en: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.cn: 微小的粒子紧贴着种子。

sentences.en: All members of the association adhere to a strict code of practice.
sentences.cn: 所有该协会的成员都遵守严格的业务守则。

sentences.en: Once in the bloodstream, the bacteria adhere to the surface of the red cells.
sentences.cn: 细菌一进入血液里，就附着在红细胞表面上。
